summary: I WAS SITTING IN MY CAR IN FRONT OF MY HOUSE . I WENT TO START THE CAR THEN MY DASHBOARD WAS BLINKING WITH ENGINE LIGHT ,BATTERY LIGHT AND BRAKE LIGHT . THEN SUDDENLY I SEEN "SERVICE POWER STEERING " MY WHEEL WAS EXTREMELY HARD TO TURN . I TOOK IT UP TO THE STEALERS TO TELL ME IT'S A ELECTRICAL PUMP ISSUE THAT WILL COST ME 2,000 DOLLARS. THIS ELECTRICAL ISSUE CAME OUT OF NO WHERE . AFTER I READING DIFFERENT CONSUMERS TESTIMONY , I NOTICED THIS HAS BEEN AN ONGOING ISSUE WITH THEIR STEERING PUMP . IF I WAS OUT ON THE ROAD AND MY STEERING WHERE STOPPED ON ME , I COULD'VE BEEN DIED . IT SHOULD BE A LAW SUIT FILED ON THEM . I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANYONE TO EVER PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM DODGE.
